oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maize production practices and problems in Egypt: Results of three farmer surveys
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fitch, J.B.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Experiments
Methods
Surveys
Farming systems
Zea mays
Production
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The results of three surveys of Egyptian maize farmers are reported. Two of the surveys, carried out in different parts of Egypt, describe farmers' practices and circumstances. The third survey monitors an on-farm experimental program for maize, comparing practices on trial farms to those of neighboring farmers. Implications are drawn for setting maize research priorities.
